author: mattmann
msg: - fix for OODT-42 Fix CAS-Catalog to work in apache and pull over new changes since apache port (CHANGES.txt)

author: tdunning
msg: Adjusted class structure and API for classifiers to allow a group key to passed down into the training.
Also broke out the gradient computation to allow variant training objectives such as AUC in addition to logistic loss.
Added the gradient to serialized content
Made a new PolymorphicTypeAdapter to limit amount of repeated code

author: nash
msg: Add instructions for building the tutorial
